trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around September 19th 2011
divs: sighting detailslast night 9\19\2011 at around 9:50pm, i just happened to be sitting outside in a chair looking at the stars only for a moment, and then from the north (over my house) about 10 or so tannish\grayish colored triangular objects went from the north to south and out of my view. the objects had no lights but i could see them because they were lighter color wise than the background sky. i consider my an amateur astronomer, andi have a decent telescope, and i do look at the sky quite often, and i have never seen anything like this. after i calmed down i tried to make a mental note of what i saw. the objects looked quite similar to a stealth bomber with triangular long wings, but had no lights but i could seem them very easily kind of like the ground clutter light made them to be seen???, also no sound at all before, during or after they passed and i waited and expected to hear something but heard nothing. they weren���t that high in the sky, so i was expecting some noise. anyway, i usually don't say or do anything when i may have seen something in the sky, but this time, i had an eery feeling about what i saw. i just also saw that someone in dallas saw similar objects last night posted on this website.
Summary: Triangular shape, no sound, no lights, looked like stealth bomber
